appDescription: Web application for transcribing and translating audio files

serverSettings.title: Server Settings
serverSettings.initialSetupMessage: Please configure the Whisper API server.
serverSettings.credentialsHiddenMessage: The administrator has restricted the display of credentials.
serverSettings.disableProxyToEditDetailed: You cannot edit credentials while proxy mode is enabled. Please disable proxy mode to edit.
serverSettings.apiUrlInfo: Enter the endpoint URL of the Whisper API server.
serverSettings.apiTokenInfo: Enter an API key if required.
serverSettings.proxyUrlInfo: The endpoint URL of the proxy server.
serverSettings.proxyTokenInfo: The API key used by the proxy server.
serverSettings.proxyModeInfo: Server proxy mode relays API requests through the server.
serverSettings.proxyModeDisabled: Proxy mode is disabled by the administrator.
serverSettings.proxyDisabledMessage: Server proxy mode is disabled in this instance. USE_SERVER_PROXY=false is set in the environment.
serverSettings.proxyLockedHideCredentials: Proxy mode cannot be changed because credential protection mode is active.
serverSettings.proxyLockedEditDisabled: Proxy mode is always enabled because credential editing is disabled.
serverSettings.resetToDefaultsTooltipProxy: Reset proxy mode settings to initial state (empty)
serverSettings.resetToDefaultsTooltipDirect: Reset direct mode settings to initial values from config.js or environment variables
serverSettings.proxyModeDisplayOnlyMessage: In proxy mode, server-configured values (URL, API key, authentication status) are displayed for reference but cannot be edited. Switch to direct mode to enable editing.
serverSettings.proxyModeTokenInfo: API token setting for proxy mode. Some Whisper server implementations may require tokens even when using proxy mode.

message.success: Whisper API server is running normally
message.error: Cannot connect to Whisper API server

model.label: Model
model.help: Choose the AI model for transcription. Larger models provide higher accuracy but require more processing time. Select the appropriate model based on your accuracy and speed requirements.

language.label: Language
language.help: Specify the language of the audio content. 'Auto Detect' allows the AI to automatically identify the language. Selecting a specific language may improve recognition accuracy for that language.

timestampGranularity.label: Timestamp Granularity
timestampGranularity.help: Choose the detail level of timestamps in transcription results. 'Word Level' provides individual timestamps for each word, while 'Segment Level' provides timestamps for sentences or paragraphs.

vadFilter.label: Use VAD Filter
vadFilter.help: VAD (Voice Activity Detection) automatically detects and focuses on speech segments while filtering out silent portions. This improves accuracy for noisy environments or long recordings with intermittent speech.

temperature.label: Temperature
temperature.help: Controls the randomness of AI output (0.0-1.0). Lower values (0.0) produce more consistent and confident results, while higher values (1.0) allow for more diverse outputs. Recommended range: 0.0-0.3 for transcription.

prompt.label: Prompt
prompt.help: Provide context or instructions to guide the AI transcription. Examples: 'Focus on technical terminology', 'Include proper punctuation', or describe the topic/domain of the audio content.

hotwords.label: Hotwords
hotwords.help: Specify important words, proper nouns, or technical terms that should be recognized accurately. Examples: company names, person names, product names, or domain-specific terminology.

fileUpload.title: File Upload
fileUpload.description: Drag & drop a file here, or click to select

logs.title: Logs
logs.chunksInfo: Large file split into {{chunks}} chunks (approximately 100MB each).
logs.singleFileProcessing: File size is small, processing without splitting.

errors.browserExtensionError: Browser extension error persists. Please disable extensions and try again.

configError.title: Configuration Error
configError.createConfigFile: Please create a config.js file in the public directory with the following format:
configError.cannotStart: The application cannot start without proper configuration. Please resolve the configuration issue and refresh the page.
